comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Mrs. Arthur Scott Burden was the former Cynthia Burke Roche. See en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cynthia_Roche See www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2162654261/ for another picture and more information

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Date on negative is 8/29/13.  On August 28, 1913, she had offered trophies for a golf tournament at the Newport Golf Club.

comment._content: It is crazy how much fashion and beauty change over time.
